page.title: 20ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: The playhouse offers a wide range of music,drama,dance and films in the main auditorium and studio.The playhouse is host to a wide range of national performing companies and local amateurs, all having the benifit of professional back stage management. Ticket prices range from Â£2.95 to Â£4.25 for the main auditorium and Â£1.95 for the studio,with concessions for children,pensioners and the unemployed. As well as live performances the Playhouse is used for dance and drama classes,exhibitions of all kinds and a meeting place for people in its bars and restaurants.The Playhouse is subsidised by Harlow Council and managed by the Playhouse Theatre Trust.
